function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective workplace regulations and measures","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread in offices and workplaces","Mitigation":"Implementing strict workplace guidelines, promoting work-from-home, and enforcing penalties for policy violations","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, remote work technologies","People":"Employees, employers, visitors to the workplace","Owner":"Government, employers"}]}
